item.title: Art Basel at the Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong offers menus that are inspired by art
item.description:
The Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong, the official hotel partner of Art Basel Hong Kong for the third consecutive year, will offer guests a range of special services this March. These include art-themed menus at the Michelin-starred restaurants Mandarin Grill + Bar and Pierre, as well as an exclusive accommodation package. From March 11th to 17th, 2015, Chef Pierre Gagnaire of the two-Michelin-starred restaurant Pierre will present unique menus entitled “The Art of Pierre Gagnaire...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/art-basel-at-the-mandarin-oriental-hong-kong-offers-menus-that-are-inspired-by-art/
